name: Borble's Quest
description:
Welcome to Borble's quest!

Join Borble as he explores the world on a quest to defeat the formiddable red dragon!

This game only uses one button, tap to move foward, hold to slide and release to jump!

This is my first ever published game,  it took about 2000 lines of code, endless bugfixing,  hours of terrible 3d modelling and shoddy Midi composing.  The bossfight at the end  took a lot of sweat and cost me many many hours of sleep,  so so i hope its understandable why i'm now dead inside. I hope you enjoy!

if you guys like it, i will continue to work on this, adding all the things i wanted to add but didnt have time for ;)
